short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set scrollbar color to dark while using dark theme on Youtube.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you annoyed by light scrollbar on YouTube even when you have active dark mode? Then this extension is for you. It fixes following issue and enforces dark scrollbar when dark mode is active.
